Projects

  • 2024.09 - 2024.12
    Humber College - Information Technology Service (ITS)
    Led a five-member team to develop a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) based chatbot to automate curriculum design research[cite: 12]. Enhanced the retrieval system's effectiveness using multi-stage re-ranking of retrieved content representation (DLM, TDILM, monoT5)[cite: 14].
    • Chatbot reduced faculty research and compile time for curriculum design from average 1 hours to 2 minutes with content accuracy of 95%[cite: 16].
